mapper.select: SELECT p.PIDX,p.PRICE,p.PNAME,NVL(AVG(r.RATING)*20+10,0) AS rRATING,NVL(COUNT(r.PIDX),0) AS rRCOUNT,d.DNAME,TO_CHAR(p.pSumnail) as pSumnail FROM PRODUCTS p LEFT OUTER JOIN REVIEW R on p.PIDX = R.PIDX , DEPT d WHERE p.PNAME LIKE '%' || #{param1} ||'%' and p.DIDX = d.DIDX group by p.PIDX,p.PRICE, p.PNAME,d.DNAME,TO_CHAR(p.pSumnail)
